entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
